title: Check Grant Reporting Status
description: A non-profit that received a government grant is checking to see if their quarterly report was received.

tasks.description: Identify the non-profit organization and their specific grant.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the organization's grant file.

tasks.description: Check the system for the status of their latest quarterly report submission.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms that the report was successfully received and is pending review.

tasks.description: Communicate the status to the organization.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a clear status update.
